directions.step:
*I would add shredded cheese to the original recipe instead of as an option. Fry and crumble bacon. Preheat oven to 450. Mix all ingredients. Form in small balls on ungreased cookie sheet. Brush with beaten egg or milk. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until golden.
Sylvia's comments: I'm not sure where I got this recipe, but it was easy and quite good, and I bet just about anything could be substituted for the bacon/bell pepper/onions. I used oregano and shredded cheddar in one batch, and dried salad toppings in another, and they all came out fine. I also dropped tablespoonsful onto a cookie sheet rather than forming them in small balls and skipped the "brush with beaten egg" part
